name: Kobold Mage
text: When [CARDNAME] casts a Spell, it deals 1 damage to all n. Units/Structures.
script:
-- TODO not tested
function _Create(props)
    local result = CardCreation:Unit(props)
    result:AddSubtype('Mage')
    result.triggers[#result.triggers+1] = EffectCreation:TriggerBuilder()
        :Check(Common:IsCaster(result))
        :Cost(Common:NoCost())
        :IsSilent(false)
        :On(TRIGGERS.SPELL_CAST)
        :Zone(ZONES.PLACED)
        :Effect(function (playerID, args)
            local tile = GetTileWith(result.id)
            local neighbors = GetNeighbors({ tile.iPos, tile.jPos })
            for _, neighbor in ipairs(neighbors) do
                if neighbor ~= nil and neighbor.entity ~= nil then
                    DealDamage(result.id, {neighbor.iPos, neighbor.jPos}, 3)
                end
            end
        end)
        :Build()
    return result
end
